title: Beyond Bionic
overview: Action adventurer Andy Torbet takes on some of the biggest challenges of his life as he attempts to match the super-skills of some of nature's most fearless super heroes - but it's not going to be easy.Beyond Bionic profiles the science behind the animal's amazing ability, and explore a series of new hi-tech gadgets and engineering principles which Andy uses in an attempt to replicate the natural and physical attributes of animals.
